title: Eric Fromm (Neil McLaughlin)
dc:creator: Queens Podcast Lab
description: It is classic theorists week on The Annex Sociology Podcast, as we discuss Eric Fromm with Neil McLaughlin (McMaster). Neil recently published Eric Fromm and Global Public Sociology (2021, Bristol University Press).
